<a href="{{ "/index" | relative_url }}">Home</a> &gt; <a href="{{ "/browser-rum" | relative_url }}">@datadog/browser-rum</a>

## browser-rum package

Datadog Browser RUM SDK - Full version with Session Replay and Real User Profiling capabilities. Use this package to monitor your web application's performance and user experience.

## Interfaces

Interface


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-rum.rumactioneventdomaincontext" | relative_url }}">RumActionEventDomainContext</a>


</td><td>

Additional information available when the SDK dispatches a RUM Action event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-rum.rumerroreventdomaincontext" | relative_url }}">RumErrorEventDomainContext</a>


</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-rum.rumfetchresourceeventdomaincontext" | relative_url }}">RumFetchResourceEventDomainContext</a>


</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-rum.rumglobal" | relative_url }}">RumGlobal</a>


</td><td>

The RUM Browser SDK global object that provides all the public methods.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-rum.ruminitconfiguration" | relative_url }}">RumInitConfiguration</a>


</td><td>

Configuration options to pass to the `init()` method when initializing the RUM SDK.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-rum.rumotherresourceeventdomaincontext" | relative_url }}">RumOtherResourceEventDomainContext</a>


</td><td>

Additional information available when the SDK dispatches a Resource event that is neither fetch nor XHR.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>
